author: ajaquith
msg: Eliminated the need to hard-code <fmr:setBundle> tags in JSPs by setting the web.xml <comtext-param> javax.servlet.jsp.jstl.fmt.localizationContext so that it points to templates.default. Removed the setBundle tags from all JSPs. [JSPWIKI-195]: Superfluous WEB-INF/i18n directory created during war build. Also, several unneeded JARs were also being included.
